verses.verse: וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <WH157> ve-'A-hav-ta, Therefore thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> ve-sha-mar-Ta and keep מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <WH4931> mish-mar-To, his charge וְחֻקֹּתָ֧יו <WH2708> ve-chuk-ko-Tav and his statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֛יו <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tav and his judgments וּמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <WH4687> u-mitz-vo-Tav and his commandments כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim. alway

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֮ <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem And know הַיּוֹם֒ <WH3117> hai-yOm ye this day כִּ֣י׀ <WH3588> ki for לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for בְּנֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1121> be-nei-Chem, for [I speak] not with your children אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- have not יָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> ya-de-'U which have not known וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- have not רָא֔וּ <WH7200> ra-'U, and which have not seen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מוּסַ֖ר <WH4148> mu-Sar the chastisement יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גָּדְל֕וֹ <WH1433> ga-de-Lo his greatness אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do hand הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> ha-cha-za-Kah, his mighty וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> u-ze-ro-'O arm הַנְּטוּיָֽה׃ <WH5186> han-ne-tu-Yah. and his stretched out

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֹֽתֹתָיו֙ <WH226> 'o-to-Tav And his miracles וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַעֲשָׂ֔יו <WH4639> ma-'a-Sav, and his acts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah which he did בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> le-far-'Oh unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> ar-Tzo. and unto all his land

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> 'a-Sah And what he did לְחֵ֨יל <WH2428> le-Cheil unto the army מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לְסוּסָ֣יו <WH5483> le-su-Sav unto their horses וּלְרִכְבּ֗וֹ <WH7393> u-le-rich-Bo, and to their chariots אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher when הֵצִ֜יף <WH6687> he-Tzif to overflow אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֵ֤י <WH4325> mei how he made the water יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea סוּף֙ <WH5488> suf of the Red עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> pe-nei-Hem, them בְּרָדְפָ֖ם <WH7291> be-ra-de-Fam as they pursued אַחֲרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Chem; after וַיְאַבְּדֵ֣ם <WH6> vay-'ab-be-Dem hath destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, you and [how] the LORD עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad this הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom them unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. he

וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah And what he did לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; unto you in the wilderness עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <WH935> bo-'a-Chem until ye came עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this

וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and what עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah And what he did לְדָתָ֣ן <WH1885> le-da-Tan unto Dathan וְלַאֲבִירָ֗ם <WH48> ve-la-'a-vi-Ram, and Abiram בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons אֱלִיאָב֮ <WH446> 'e-li-'Av of Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רְאוּבֵן֒ <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher and what פָּצְתָ֤ה <WH6475> pa-tze-Tah opened הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz how the earth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פִּ֔יהָ <WH6310> Pi-ha, her mouth וַתִּבְלָעֵ֥ם <WH1104> vat-tiv-la-'Em and swallowed them up וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH1004> bat-tei-Hem and their households וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH168> 'o-ho-lei-Hem; and their tents וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and every הַיְקוּם֙ <WH3351> hay-Kum and all the substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher and what בְּרַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> be-rag-lei-Hem, that [was] in their possession בְּקֶ֖רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev in the midst כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of all Israel

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> 'ei-nei-Chem But your eyes הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <WH7200> ha-ro-'Ot, have seen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh acts יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הַגָּדֹ֑ל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol; all the great אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'a-Sah. which he did

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH8104> u-she-mar-Tem Therefore shall ye keep אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> ham-mitz-Vah, all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> me-tzav-ve-Cha I command הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; you this day לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so תֶּחֶזְק֗וּ <WH2388> te-chez-Ku, that ye may be strong וּבָאתֶם֙ <WH935> u-va-Tem and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH3423> vi-rish-Tem and possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> 'oe-Rim whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah. to possess

וּלְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> u-le-Ma-'an that תַּאֲרִ֤יכוּ <WH748> ta-'a-Ri-chu And that ye may prolong יָמִים֙ <WH3117> ya-Mim [your] days עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem unto your fathers לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem וּלְזַרְעָ֑ם <WH2233> u-le-zar-'Am; unto them and to their seed אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> u-de-Vash. and honey ס sa-Mek

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, For the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you בָא־ <WH935> va- whither thou goest in שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah, to possess לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo like כְאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> che-'E-retz it [is] not as the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt הִ֔וא <WH1931> hi he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יְצָאתֶ֖ם <WH3318> ye-tza-Tem from whence ye came out מִשָּׁ֑ם <WH8033> mish-Sham; in it אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher where תִּזְרַע֙ <WH2232> tiz-Ra' where thou sowedst אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- זַרְעֲךָ֔ <WH2233> zar-'a-Cha, thy seed וְהִשְׁקִ֥יתָ <WH8248> ve-hish-Ki-ta and wateredst בְרַגְלְךָ֖ <WH7272> ve-rag-le-Cha [it] with thy foot כְּגַ֥ן <WH1588> ke-Gan as a garden הַיָּרָֽק׃ <WH3419> hai-ya-Rak. of herbs

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz, But the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH935> 'oe-Rim abide שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah, to possess אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz it [is] a land הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> ha-Rim of hills וּבְקָעֹ֑ת <WH1237> u-ve-ka-'Ot; and valleys לִמְטַ֥ר <WH4306> lim-Tar of the rain הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> tish-teh- [and] drinketh מָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. water

אֶ֕רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz A land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God דֹּרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> do-Resh careth for אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah; תָּמִ֗יד <WH8548> ta-Mid, [are] always עֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> 'ei-Nei the eyes יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בָּ֔הּ Bah, מֵֽרֵשִׁית֙ <WH7225> me-re-Shit upon it from the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> hash-sha-Nah, of the year וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad even אַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> 'a-cha-Rit even unto the end שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. of the year ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, shall come אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if שָׁמֹ֤עַ <WH8085> sha-Mo-a' And it shall come to pass if ye shall hearken תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> tish-me-'U diligently אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tai, unto my commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> me-tzav-Veh which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; you this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <WH157> le-'a-ha-Vah to love אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God וּלְעָבְד֔וֹ <WH5647> u-le-'a-ve-Do, and to serve בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem him with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol and all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> naf-she-Chem. and with all your soul

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will send עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> 'E-sev grass בְּשָׂדְךָ֖ <WH7704> be-sa-de-Cha in thy fields לִבְהֶמְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH929> liv-hem-Te-cha; for thy cattle וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <WH398> ve-'a-chal-Ta that thou mayest eat וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH7646> ve-sa-Va-'e-ta. and be full

הִשָּֽׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> hish-sha-me-Ru Take heed לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, פֶּ֥ן <WH6435> pen are not יִפְתֶּ֖ה <WH6601> yif-Teh be not deceived לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem; to yourselves that your heart וְסַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH5493> ve-sar-Tem, and ye turn aside וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <WH5647> va-'a-vad-Tem and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim, other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> ve-hish-ta-cha-vi-Tem and worship לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְחָרָ֨ה <WH2734> ve-cha-Rah be kindled אַף־ <WH639> 'af- wrath יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And [then] the LORD'S בָּכֶ֗ם ba-Chem, וְעָצַ֤ר <WH6113> ve-'a-Tzar against you and he shut up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim the heaven וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become מָטָ֔ר <WH4306> ma-Tar, that there be no rain וְהָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ve-Ha-'a-da-Mah, and that the land לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo will be no תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> tit-Ten yield אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְבוּלָ֑הּ <WH2981> ye-vu-Lah; not her fruit וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֣ם <WH6> va-'a-vad-Tem and [lest] ye perish מְהֵרָ֗ה <WH4120> me-he-Rah, quickly מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> me-'Al and הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <WH2896> hat-to-Vah, from off the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten giveth לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְשַׂמְתֶּם֙ <WH7760> ve-sam-Tem Therefore shall ye lay up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> de-va-Rai these my words אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh, these עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem in your heart וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and on נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> naf-she-Chem; and in your soul וּקְשַׁרְתֶּ֨ם <WH7194> u-ke-shar-Tem and bind אֹתָ֤ם <WH853> 'o-Tam לְאוֹת֙ <WH226> le-'Ot them for a sign עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> yed-Chem, upon your hand וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu shall be as לְטוֹטָפֹ֖ת <WH2903> le-to-ta-Fot that they may be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between עֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> 'ei-nei-Chem. between your eyes
